short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Workable Scraper: Scrape Workable job postings to CSV/EXCEL/JSON format easily. Download your Workable jobs in just a few clicks!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Export Workable job postings to CSV and Excel effortlessly with the reliable scraper tool. Take the hassle out of job searching.

HOW IT WORKS
1. Search for your desired jobs on Workable https://jobs.workable.com/search.
2. Copy the search link and paste it into the extension.
3. Download the job postings in CSV or EXCEL format.
